ymax <- max(y0,y1,y2,y3)
ymin <- min(y0,y1,y2,y3)
yquart <- (ymax-ymin)/4
plot(x,y0,type="l",col=rainbow(4)[1],main="Average Phastcons around the Center of Sites",xlab="Distance from the Center (bp)",ylab="Average Phastcons",ylim=c(ymin-yquart,ymax+yquart))
lines(x,y1,col=rainbow(4)[2])
lines(x,y2,col=rainbow(4)[3])
lines(x,y3,col=rainbow(4)[4])
abline(v=0)
legend("topright",c('37-1','37-2','37-3','37-4'),col=rainbow(4),lty=c(1,1,1,1))
dev.off()
